Package model

Class Model

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
model.Model
public class Model
extends Observable
This class represents the model the game uses.
Author:
Adi, Joesph, Shane, Dillion

    • getCurrentTurn

      Gets the nation whose turn it is rightnow
      Returns:
      The current nation

    • endTurn

      public void endTurn()
      Ends the turn of the current nation. It becomes the next natons turn when this method is called. The gold values for the nation whose turn is ending is also updated.

    • updateView

      public void updateView()
      Updates any observers that the map has changed.

    • gameOver

      public void gameOver()
      The game is marked as over and observers are notified.
